title: Strengthening Healthcare Practice Competency: Elementary Mathematics Skills Education Based on the Iterative Development Model (IDM)

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can describe IDM’s three arenas (Analysis/Design/Development) and six phases (Needs Analysis/Learner Analysis/Message Design/Media Selection/Prototype Production/Final Development).
Learners can advance elementary mathematics educational content through three stages (Draft/Intermediate/Final Version) by applying fidelity-enhancing strategies in iterative development.
Learners can design smartphone-compatible math educational multimedia materials (e.g., geometric manipulation animations) based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
